Package net.nextinfinity.core.events

Class AbstractEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.event.Event
      • net.nextinfinity.core.events.AbstractEvent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameCountdownEvent, GameDeathEvent, GameEndEvent, GameJoinEvent, GameLeaveEvent, GameSecondEvent, GameStartEvent, PlayerJoinArenaEvent, PlayerLeaveArenaEvent

    public abstract class AbstractEvent
extends org.bukkit.event.Event
    The AbstractEvent class forms the basis for all events fired by CTCore.
